quotes: It’s not the strength of the body that counts, but the strength of the spirit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes: Tough times don’t last, tough people do
author: Anonymous

quotes: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it
author: Charles R. Swendoll

quotes: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us
author: A.P.J. Absul Kalam

quotes: Accept the challenges so that you can feel the exhilaration of victory.
author: George S. Patton

quotes: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, ambition inspired, and success achieved
author: Helen Keller

quotes: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny
author: C.S. Lewis

quotes: The best of healers is good chee
author: Pindus

quotes: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes: There is no medicine like hope, no incentive so great, and no tonic so powerful as expectation of something tomorrow
author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity
author: Albert Einstein

quotes: Life isn’t about waiting for the storm to pass, it’s about learning to dance in the rain
author: Vivian Greene
